nodes.bodyText:
This is an unrelated change I am hoping to sneak in here. Seeing this "error" in the logs is quite distracting when debugging things.
If you'd want to keep this as an error level log message, we should add a check if that file already exists.

Can you change to !newFile.getParentFile().exists() &&!newFile.getParentFile().mkdirs()
then we only try to create the folder if it does not exist and thus the error is correct, if it fails.
